data.title: Villa Rica Lofts - 301 Temple St Villa Rica GA
data.meta_description: The most trafficked website about home sales and rentals, with real estate values for almost every U.S. home. 1,000,000 listings that you won't find on MLS.
data.text: Welcome Home to Villa Rica Lofts Our unique and stylish loft apartments in downtown Villa Rica are the perfect place to call home. Converted from an old cotton warehouse in 2002, our 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom lofts feature original cement floors, wood beams, and exposed brick walls. Each unit comes with a stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, and washer and dryer hookups. Experience the Charm of Downtown Villa Rica Villa Rica Lofts is located in the heart of downtown Villa Rica, within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and entertainment. Enjoy the convenience of having everything you need right at your fingertips. Live in a Pet-Free and Smoke-Free Community At Villa Rica Lofts, we are committed to providing a peaceful and enjoyable living environment for all of our residents. That's why we are a pet-free and smoke-free community. Apply Online Today We invite you to apply for a loft apartment at Villa Rica Lofts today. We look forward to showing you your new home!
